page.title: 17A BUSY HAPPY WIFE'S DAY
page.content: My name is Yvonne Blake.Living in Billingborough is very peaceful after living in London for 32 years. Today is Monday and this is the day I go swimming with the local Primary School which my daughters attend. I go into the water to help the non-swimmers. When I get home, I have to feed the animals. After I have had my lunch, I take Blazer our dog for a walk. When I've taken Blazer out I have to clean up and fetch my children from school. I prepare dinner and my husband comes home from the workshop where he makes pine furniture. After dinner the children go out to play with their friends and I have a chat with my husband about our day. At 7 o'clock my youngest child goes to bed and then at 8 o'clock my eldest child goes to bed and my husband and I spend the evening together.
